title: Unstructured for a summer
creator_credit: Shelagh Mackenzie, Joseph Koenig and ONF | NFB
brief_description: In the summer of 1968 a group of high-school students from Quebec and Ontario worked on a filmmaking project with the help of the National Film Board. The students discuss their reactions and evaluations of the project.
creator_credit_for_label: Shelagh Mackenzie, Joseph Koenig and ONF | NFB
